jdbc-user-service.authorities-by-username-query: SELECT USER_MST.LOGIN,ROLE_ACCESS_RLNS.ACCESS_ID FROM ACCESS_LIST INNER JOIN ROLE_ACCESS_RLNS ON ROLE_ACCESS_RLNS.ACCESS_ID = ACCESS_LIST.ACCESS_ID INNER JOIN ROLE_MST ON ROLE_ACCESS_RLNS.ROLE_ID = ROLE_MST.ROLE_ID INNER JOIN USER_ROLE_RLNS ON ROLE_MST.ROLE_ID = USER_ROLE_RLNS.ROLE_ID INNER JOIN USER_MST ON USER_MST.USERID = USER_ROLE_RLNS.USERID WHERE USER_MST.LOGIN = ? AND ROLE_ACCESS_RLNS.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND USER_ROLE_RLNS.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND USER_MST.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND ACCESS_LIST.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND ROLE_MST.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y'
jdbc-user-service.users-by-username-query: select LOGIN,PASSWD,1 from USER_MST where LOGIN = ?
